title: Before the live!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Why does my heart always beat really fast before lives….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Calm yourself. For today, you may sleep wrapped in Yohane’s wi-....wings of darkness….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Oh~. For you to slip up on an important part, it seems Yoshiko is also nervous<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I-, I’m not! There’s no way I can be nervous!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yoshiko-chan is also nervous huh. I’m glad<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said! I’m not! Also it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu. You’re full of energy. Keep up that condition tomorrow alright<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fufufu. You think you can keep up with Yohane’s dark power….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I don’t know about channeling dark powers or whatnot, but let’s do our best tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
